segments.text: I am calling to apply to work in your agency of entry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Do you have any advantages to work in our entry agency ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I know many ambassadors in Chinese Embassy and British Embassy in China .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful , I will give you a chance of interview .
segments.speaker: S2
